name: Another One Bites the Crust (v4)
description:
Play as Whisk and help save Pastry Paradise! 🎂

Help Biscuit the Narrator and Old Apple Pie collect fruit ingredients, add them to the bowl, and make magical cookies that give you superpowers... But what kind?

Hint: To go outside and use the magic cookies, make sure and put all three fruit ingredients into the bowl, collect the cookies, then talk to Old Apple Pie. 

Then you can jump out the window - once you're outside, click on the cookies in your inventory to see what happens!

Keyboard & Mouse Controls:

Move using WASD keys

Jump by clicking on Whisk

Interact by clicking

Click on Inventory to access your items

Touchscreen Controls:

Move and interact by pressing the screen

Cookie powers

🍰 Jammy Dodga: Super Speed

🍌 Banana Biscuit: Double jump enabled

🍪 Jiffy Jaffy Cake: Fly

-

A game made by:

SCOREscotland & Tinderbox Collective
